scripts.deploy:staging: VITE_API_URL=https://agenr-api-staging.fly.dev vite build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name agenr-console --branch staging
scripts.deploy:prod: VITE_API_URL=https://api.agenr.ai vite build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name agenr-console
scripts.deploy:demo: VITE_API_URL=https://agenr-api-staging.fly.dev VITE_DEMO_MODE=true vite build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name agenr-console --branch staging
